English: to keep on fighting in spite of all setbacks (idiom)

d.a: `半途~`而~`回~﹑`知難而退~﹑`一蹶不振~﹑`因噎廢食~
d.s: `百折不回~﹑`百折不挫~﹑`不屈不撓~﹑`堅韌不拔~﹑`絕不屈服~

English: to keep on fighting in spite of all setbacks (idiom)
to be undaunted by repeated setbacks
francais: ne pas se laisser infléchir par les obstacles
Mille revers ne peuvent le faire reculer.
